com.noctarius.borabora.builder

Interface WriterBuilder


  • public interface WriterBuilder
    The WriterBuilder class is used to configure a new Writer instance. The configuration is meant to include TagStrategys for new, non-standard semantic tags and data types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WriterBuilder addTagStrategies(Iterable<TagStrategy> tagStrategies)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Writer configuration.
      WriterBuilder addTagStrategies(TagStrategy tagStrategy1, TagStrategy tagStrategy2)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Writer configuration.
      WriterBuilder addTagStrategies(TagStrategy tagStrategy1, TagStrategy tagStrategy2, TagStrategy... tagStrategies)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Writer configuration.
      WriterBuilder addTagStrategy(TagStrategy tagStrategy)
      Adds the given TagStrategy instance to the new Writer configuration.
      Writer build()
      Returns a new Writer instance based on the internal configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • addTagStrategy

        WriterBuilder addTagStrategy(TagStrategy tagStrategy)
        Adds the given TagStrategy instance to the new Writer configuration.
        Parameters:
        tagStrategy - the TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if tagStrategy is null

      • addTagStrategies

        WriterBuilder addTagStrategies(TagStrategy tagStrategy1,
                               TagStrategy tagStrategy2)
        Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Writer configuration.
        Parameters:
        tagStrategy1 - the first TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        tagStrategy2 - the second TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either tagStrategy instance is null

      • addTagStrategies

        WriterBuilder addTagStrategies(TagStrategy tagStrategy1,
                               TagStrategy tagStrategy2,
                               TagStrategy... tagStrategies)
        Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Writer configuration.
        Parameters:
        tagStrategy1 - the first TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        tagStrategy2 - the second TagStrategy to add to the configuration
        tagStrategies - the TagStrategy array to add to the configuration
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any tagStrategies instance is null

      • addTagStrategies

        WriterBuilder addTagStrategies(Iterable<TagStrategy> tagStrategies)
        Adds the given TagStrategy instances to the new Writer configuration.
        Parameters:
        tagStrategies - the TagStrategy array to add to the configuration
        Returns:
        this builder instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any tagStrategies instance is null

      • build

        Writer build()
        Returns a new Writer instance based on the internal configuration. The returned writer is fully thread-safe and stateless and can be stored and shared by multiple threads, however GraphBuilders created using this Writer are not.
        Returns:
        the new Writer instance
